plot: A photographer suffers from "strange luck," and is the victim of both good and bad coincidences that involve him in the problems of others.
plot_en: A photographer suffers from "strange luck," and is the victim of both good and bad coincidences that involve him in the problems of others.
plot_es: A photographer suffers from "strange luck," and is the victim of both good and bad coincidences that involve him in the problems of others.
title: Strange Luck
